title: Hi! I am...
points: A computer science student specializing in the software engineering stream. Currently studying at the University of Toronto
An aspiring full stack and frontend developer, with a recent interest in machine learning

title: I can do...
points: Development of large, beautiful, and dynamic web or mobile applications for various projects
Work with a number of programming tools, frameworks, and databases. I'm able to do full stack, but I mainly specialize in backend development using frameworks such as Java Spring and Python Django
Assembly coding and simple circuit designs

title: I also do...
points: Piano-performing and teaching. I am an ARCT certified pianist from the Royal Conservatory of Music
Creative writing, visual arts, and music composition. I enjoy posting some of my works online
Designing with Adobe Photoshop+Illustrator and composing/covering using FL Studio
